price: Sema: Tembeeni ulimwenguni, kisha mtazame ulikuwaje mwisho wa wanao kanusha.
arabic: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waambie hawa makafiri: Nendeni pande zote duniani, mzingatie vipi maangamio yalivyo kuwa mwisho wa wanao wakanusha Mitume wao. Uzingatieni vyema mwisho huu na khatima hiyo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul sīrū fī al-arḍi thumma unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
